headline: L3Harris Receives New Contract to Power THAAD Interceptors
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., February 16, 2026--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has received a new contract valued at nearly $400 million to produce additional solid rocket boost motors and Liquid Divert and Attitude Control Systems (LDACS) as a supplier to the prime contract for the Missile Defense Agency’s Terminal High Altitude Area Defense (THAAD) system. THAAD is one of the nation’s primary defenses against short, medium and intermediate-range missiles.
